alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Davison; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 16 at 10:41AM MDT until April 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Beadle, Sanborn and Davison Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong northwest winds, coupled with low relative humidity values along and west of the Interstate 29 corridor, will create elevated fire danger conditions. Please follow the necessary safety precautions if you are planning any outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
